about_the_game:
Simplode Suite is a toolset which lets you do more with your computer. It contains a great variety of features, all in one convenient, consistent, compatible, compact package. Alongside the large number of free features, you can choose any one of the premium features to have for free as well. You can also save on premium features by buying them all together in the All Packages bundle. This product is available natively in English, but it has automated translations for most major languages.

It can help you:
  • Force some applications to operate in borderless fullscreen mode, with over-scan and under-scan control which can sometimes help compensate for bad FOV options.
  • Overlay other applications on your windowed mode and borderless fullscreen mode games, with click through transparency support. For example, you could play a video at half transparency on top of the bottom right hand corner of your game, and still be able to click beneath the video.
  • Stabilize CPU overclocking with configurable dynamic thermal and load based power management.
  • Dynamically switch between high performance and high efficiency power settings, with live optimization based on the real-time demands of the application or game you are using.
  • Use a Kinect V2 to create a virtual touch screen in front of you, which may provide an interesting challenge for some games, or just a way to spice up content creation.
  • Dynamically adjust your speaker/headphone volume in real time, to balance loud and soft noises.
  • Dynamically adjust your microphone volume in real time, so that your teammates will stop complaining about you being too loud or too quiet.
  • Use custom mouse acceleration.
  • Manage your screen space by tiling with ultimate flexibility.
  • Extend battery life / save electricity / reduce heat without sacrificing on-demand performance.
  • Use most of your existing apps with a glass-like dynamic styling.
  • Fully customize your experience within the app, including easy theme presets.
  • Quickly find running programs.
  • Quickly take partial screenshots.
  • Use the ring menu as a nifty application launcher.
  • Figure out where your cursor is hiding.
  • Explore ~100 actions, ~30 menus and ~300 configurable settings, all with online and offline documentation, plus extensive video documentation.

This list is really just the tip of the iceberg. You can see more by checking out the individual DLCs or by visiting the product website.

movies.name: Simplode Suite - Customizable Ring Menu System (Free)
Customizable Ring Menu System with Virtual Touch Screen
Hybrid Tiling Window Manager with Virtual Touch Screen

name: Simplode Suite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1+ GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Virtual Touch Screen functionality used in videos has its own system requirements listed in its DLC page.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz (64bit) with 2 or more cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU or integrated GPU supporting DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Virtual Touch Screen functionality used in videos has its own system requirements listed in its DLC page.

short_description: Simplode Suite is a toolset which does all kinds of things. You can dynamically balance microphone and speaker volume, force borderless fullscreen, optimize your CPU power settings, take partial screenshots, create click through borderless/windowed mode overlays, and so much more.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
